name: lsatlssel
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c3, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c3, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c3, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, clmod))
-| wi(wcel(c2, clmod), wss(c3, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c3 ⊆ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (c2 ∈ LMod → c3 ⊆ c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, clmod))
-| wi(wcel(c2, clmod), wss(c3, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c2, clmod), wss(c3, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(clss, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clsa, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c2 ∈ LMod → c3 ⊆ c1)
⊣ c1 =(LSubSp ` c2)
⊣ c3 =(LSAtoms ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, clmod))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(clss, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clsa, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ LMod)
⊣ c1 =(LSubSp ` c2)
⊣ c3 =(LSAtoms ` c2)

comment: An atom is a subspace. (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2014.)
